docs.snippet: Brazil’s Neymar scored the equalizer, but in the 81st, on a penalty kick, he missed so badly the ball would have soared over two goals stacked up.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazil’s Neymar scored the equalizer, but in the 81st, on a penalty kick, he missed so badly the ball would have soared over two goals stacked up.

headline.seo: Brazil Ties Colombia as Neymar Misses Penalty Kick
headline.main: Result Is Tie, but Brazil and Colombia Stay on Attack
headline.print_headline: Result Is Tie, but Brazil and Colombia Stay on Attack

docs.snippet: Uruguay moved a step closer to becoming the first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing a bill that outlines how the drug would be produced, sold and regulated.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay moved a step closer to becoming the first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing a bill that outlines how the drug would be produced, sold and regulated.
docs.abstract: Uruguay moves step closer to becoming first country to legalize marijuana, with lawmakers introducing bill that outlines how drug would be produced, sold and regulated.

docs.snippet: In 1982, Sir Rex found himself, literally overnight, directing a tiny band of British military men against an amphibious Argentine invasion.
docs.lead_paragraph: In 1982, Sir Rex found himself, literally overnight, directing a tiny band of British military men against an amphibious Argentine invasion.
docs.abstract: Sir Rex Hunt, symbol of British defiance in the Falkland Islands war in 1982, dies at age 86.

headline.main: Sir Rex Hunt, Symbol of British Defiance in the Windswept Falklands, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Sir Rex Hunt, Symbol of British Defiance In the Windswept Falklands, Dies at 86

docs.snippet: Coach César Farías has Venezuela in contention to qualify for its first trip to the World Cup.
docs.abstract: Coach César Farías has Venezuela in contention to qualify for its first trip to the World Cup.

docs.snippet: American Airlines defended its hiring of outside contractors to modify its planes’ cabins, but its unionized mechanics say passengers’ safety was put at risk.
docs.lead_paragraph: American Airlines defended its hiring of outside contractors to modify its planes’ cabins, but its unionized mechanics say passengers’ safety was put at risk.
docs.abstract: American Airlines' efforts to increase leg room for some of its economy seats led to dozens of Boeing 757 airliners being grounded after passenger seats came loose on four flights; airline documents show workers installing the seats, hired through outside maintenance companies to save costs, did not understand how to properly install them; American Airlines is defending its hiring practices, but its unionized mechanics say passengers' safety was put at risk.

headline.seo: Installation Problems Seen in American Airlines’ Loose Seats
headline.main: Cost-Cutting Cited in Loose Plane Seats
headline.print_headline: Cost-Cutting Cited in Loose Plane Seats

docs.snippet: At the Derby di Sicilia between Palermo and Catania, something took hold of the participants on the field, something that turned into an infectious game of end-to-end attacking.
docs.lead_paragraph: At the Derby di Sicilia between Palermo and Catania, something took hold of the participants on the field, something that turned into an infectious game of end-to-end attacking.

headline.main: Passion and Goals Flow in Sicily
headline.print_headline: Passion and Goals Flow in Sicily

docs.snippet: The host Brazil will play Japan in next year’s Confederations Cup opener, and the world champion Spain will begin against Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: The host Brazil will play Japan in next year’s Confederations Cup opener, and the world champion Spain will begin against Uruguay.

headline.seo: Brazil Will Open With Japan in Confederations Cup
headline.main: Brazil Will Open With Japan in Confederations Cup

docs.snippet: In post-bubble Miami, some real estate developers are requiring initial deposits of 40 percent or more, and more as the projects get closer to completion.
docs.lead_paragraph: In post-bubble Miami, some real estate developers are requiring initial deposits of 40 percent or more, and more as the projects get closer to completion.
docs.abstract: Big Deal column; some real estate developers in Miami, reeling from a devastating bubble, are requiring initial deposits of 40 percent or more as condominium projects approach completion; model, which upends the American norm of bank financing, is borrowed from South America, where high inflation made financing risky.

headline.seo: In Miami, Using the South American Playbook
headline.main: In Miami, Using the South American Playbook

docs.snippet: Solutions to Europe's sovereign debt crisis are mostly tried and true. Here are three plans that aren't bound by the policy makers' current orthodoxy.
docs.abstract: Solutions to Europe's sovereign debt crisis are mostly tried and true. Here are three plans that aren't bound by the policy makers' current orthodoxy.

headline.main: 3 Unorthodox Ways to Solve Europe's Debt Crisis
headline.print_headline: 3 Unorthodox Ways to Solve Europe’s Debt Crisis
